mapper.insert: insert into task_tag_operation(task_tag_operation_id, task_id, tag_id, task_operation_type, task_version) values (NULL,#{taskId},#{tagId},#{taskOperationType},#{taskVersion})
mapper.delete: delete from task_tag_operation where task_id=#{taskId} and task_version>#{taskVersion}
mapper.select: select * from task_tag_operation where task_id=#{taskId} and task_version>#{taskVersion} order by task_version DESC
